goal.ch: 認識影響全球水循環的因子與其影響力
goal.en:
Students of this course will learn
(1)basic principles of global hydrological cycles
(2)hydrological cycles in the atmosphere, land, ocean, and cryosphere
(3)role of global hydrological cycles in water resource management, climate change, and material transport and distribution
how to apply or link the knowledge of hydrological cycles to their researches
